original_text:
Jammin Jars
Push Gaming ha rilasciato Jammin’ Jars – un affare di slot con simboli che cadono e si raccolgono su una griglia di otto linee verticali e otto orizzontali. Oltre alla caratteristica dei simboli che crollano, il gioco offre la possibilità di vincere consecutivamente. C’è una caratteristica bonus a forma di giri liberi, e ci sono due kicker in-game, come i rulli arcobaleno che si verificano casualmente e i Jim Jar wilds, che modificano la griglia in più di un modo. Gioca per avere la possibilità di vincere 10.000 euro per il miglior payout su un Return to Player del 96,80%.

Una grafica dolcissima
Le 64 caselle sulla griglia sono piene di vari frutti e l’obiettivo del gioco, e il risultato più atteso allo stesso tempo, è quello di vedere uno qualsiasi di questi simboli formare un cluster.
Ma aspettate! Perché lo slot Jammin’ Jars si chiama Jammin’ Jars quando i simboli sono tutti frutti? Beh, c’è un simbolo di vaso che definisce il gameplay della release. Il simbolo Jam Jar Jar è fondamentalmente il Wild, che sostituisce qualsiasi simbolo, ma fa anche pochi altri trucchi da circo propri. Poiché Jammin’ Jars è un tipo di gioco “a bobine che crolla”, ogni combinazione vincente fa sì che il gruppo vincente scompaia e faccia spazio a una nuova serie di simboli. In questo caso, il simbolo Jam Jar Jar farà un movimento casuale su un’altra fila verticale dopo aver fatto parte di una combinazione vincente.
È questa l’unica caratteristica del gioco? Neanche lontanamente. Anche se c’è solo un bonus in più, è uno che è degno come l’intero gioco stesso. Questo è il bonus gratuito “gira” che si ottiene grazie al – avete indovinato – sorridente Jam Jars. Diamo quindi un’occhiata ad alcuni ulteriori dettagli sul gioco, in modo che i giocatori possano arrivare alla parte in cui vedono esplodere alcuni frutti e restituire le potenziali vincite.

Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine Jammin Jars
Ogni volta che appare il simbolo di un vasetto, probabilmente avrà un moltiplicatore, a partire da 1x a 5x. Ciò significa che le vincite del gioco di base con il barattolo saranno moltiplicate in base all’importo indicato sul barattolo. Quindi l’atterraggio di tre dei simboli Jam Jar Jar sui rulli farà scattare la funzione Free Games Feature. La stessa proprietà bonus di questo simbolo rimane durante i giri liberi, con l’aggiunta di questi che rimangono in posizione dopo un crollo o una vincita a cascata.
Infine, ma non meno importante, la funzione arcobaleno si attiva in modo casuale dopo un testacoda non vincente. Il risultato di questo bonus è un simbolo colossale aggiunto sui rulli che può interagire con un gran numero di simboli.
La vincita del gioco comprende un grande cluster sulla griglia, preferibilmente uno che copre 25 o più quadrati sulla griglia. Se questo dovesse mai accadere, il fortunato giocatore vedrà dei premi in denaro abbastanza decenti. Diciamo che si gioca con 1,00 euro a giro. In questo caso, la vincita più grande da un singolo giro, basata su un simbolo di vincita del gioco di base, sarà di 100,00 euro per un cluster di 25 fragole, o più, e una vincita di 40 euro per un cluster che comprende tra 20 e 24 simboli di questo tipo.
Altrimenti, il modo per ricevere le vincite è quello di avere i simboli sulle righe e sui rulli adiacenti Quindi, anche se appaiono cinque simboli, il premio restituirà la puntata di €1,00. Qualsiasi cosa più di 5 cluster di simboli si traduce in un ritorno più grande. Ma è qui che il simbolo Jam Jar Jar è davvero utile nella slot Jammin’ Jars. Questo barattolo colorato sorridente è il Wild e ha una proprietà bonus di spostamento a sinistra e a destra sui rulli, alla ricerca di ulteriori combinazioni vincenti.
Per impostare il gioco per lo spin, si può vedere la finestra della Scommessa Totale che si trova al centro, appena sotto la griglia 8×8. Cliccando o toccando il simbolo della freccia verso l’alto, viene visualizzata una tabella di somme disponibili che possono essere giocate per ogni giro. Gli importi più piccoli sono 0,20€, 0,40€, 0,60€ e 1,00€. Ognuno di questi importi viene replicato ma con il punto decimale spostato a destra, una e due volte. Così nella riga successiva abbiamo importi che terminano con 10,00 euro e nella terza fila importi che sono a due cifre e terminano con 100,00 euro. Crediamo che questa gamma di scommesse offra abbastanza opzioni in modo che ogni giocatore possa trovare una somma piacevole per il suo stile di gioco e il suo budget.

Jammin Jars -Altre Slot Machine simili
Purtroppo non possiamo consigliarti altre Slot Machine a tema marmellata, in quanto Jammin’ Jars, la Slot prodotta da Push Gaming, è probabilmente unica nel suo genere. Quello che possiamo fare, invece, è consigliarti Wild Frames, la Slot tradizionale prodotta da Play N Go che ti permette di vincere fino a 7,000x!

raw_translation.response:
Experience the thrill of Push Gaming's latest release, Jammin Jars - a slot game where symbols fall and collect on an 8x8 grid. With consecutive wins and a bonus feature that offers free spins, this game also features two kicker in-game options, such as the randomly occurring rainbow reels and the Jim Jar wilds, which change the layout of the grid in multiple ways. Play for the chance to win up to €10,000 with a Return to Player of 96.80%.

The graphics are sweet and the 64 squares on the grid are filled with a variety of fruits. The goal of the game is to form a cluster with any of these symbols. But wait, why is it called Jammin' Jars when the symbols are all fruits? Well, there's a jar symbol that defines the gameplay of the release. The Jam Jar Jar symbol is essentially the wild card that replaces any symbol but also has a few tricks up its sleeve. 

As a "rolling reel" type of game, each winning combination causes the winning group to disappear and make way for a new set of symbols. In this case, the Jam Jar Jar symbol will make a random move to another vertical row after being part of a winning combination. But that's not the only feature of the game. The game also includes a free spins bonus feature, which is triggered by landing three Jam Jar Jar symbols on the reels. During free spins, the same properties of the bonus symbol apply, with the added feature of staying in position after a cascade or a winning combination.

As for winning, the game requires symbols to appear on adjacent rows and reels. The Jam Jar Jar symbol is especially helpful in this slot game as it has a bonus property of shifting left and right on the reels in search of more winning combinations. To set up the game for a spin, players can find the Total Bet window in the middle, just below the 8x8 grid. Clicking or tapping the up arrow symbol displays a table of available amounts that can be played for each spin. The smaller amounts available are €0.20, €0.40, €0.60, and €1.00. 

Unfortunately, we cannot provide other similar slot games as Jammin' Jars by Push Gaming is probably one of a kind. However, we can recommend Wild Frames - a traditional slot game by Play N Go that allows you to win up to 7,000x!

Have any more questions about Jammin' Jars? You can try the slot for free on SlotJava, or play with real money on licensed online casinos like Starcasino.it and Starvegas.it. Additionally, you can find information about promotions and bonuses, as well as get recommendations for accredited casinos from our guides on SlotJava.

Jammin Jars
Push Gaming has released Jammin' Jars - a slot game with symbols that fall and collect on an eight-by-eight vertical and horizontal grid. In addition to the cascading symbols feature, the game offers the opportunity to win consecutively. There is a free spins bonus feature, and there are two in-game kickers, like the rainbow reels that occur randomly and the Jim Jar wilds that modify the grid in more than one way. Play for a chance to win €10,000 for the best payout on a 96.80% Return to Player rate.

Sweet graphics
The 64 squares on the grid are filled with various fruits and the goal of the game, and the most anticipated outcome at the same time, is to see any of these symbols form a cluster. But wait! Why is the Jammin' Jars slot called Jammin' Jars when all the symbols are fruits? Well, there is a jar symbol that defines the gameplay of the release. The Jam Jar Jar symbol is basically the Wild, which replaces any symbol, but also does a few circus tricks of its own. Since Jammin' Jars is a type of "falling reels" game, every winning combination causes the winning group to disappear and make way for a new set of symbols. In this case, the Jam Jar Jar symbol will make a random move on another vertical row after being part of a winning combination.
Is this the only feature of the game? Not even close. Although there is only one additional bonus, it is one that is as worthy as the entire game itself. This is the free spins bonus that is obtained thanks to the - you guessed it - smiling Jam Jars. Let's take a look at some additional details about the game, so that players can get to the part where they see some fruits explode and return potential winnings.

Features and symbols of the Jammin' Jars slot machine
Whenever the jar symbol appears, it will likely have a multiplier, ranging from 1x to 5x. This means that the base game winnings with the jar will be multiplied by the amount indicated on the jar. So landing three of the Jam Jar Jar symbols on the reels will trigger the Free Games Feature. The same bonus property of this symbol remains during free spins, with the addition of them remaining in position after a cascade or a winning combo.
Last but not least, the rainbow feature is randomly activated after a non-winning spin. The result of this bonus is a colossal symbol added to the reels that can interact with a large number of symbols.
The game's winning combination includes a large cluster on the grid, preferably one that covers 25 or more squares on the grid. If this ever happens, the lucky player will see fairly decent cash prizes. Let's say you're playing with a €1.00 bet per spin. In this case, the biggest win from a single spin, based on a base game winning symbol, will be €100.00 for a cluster of 25 strawberries or more, and a win of €40.00 for a cluster that includes between 20 and 24 symbols of this type.
Otherwise, the way to get wins is to have symbols on adjacent rows and reels. So even if five symbols appear, the prize will return the €1.00 bet. Anything more than 5 symbol clusters translates into a bigger payout. But this is where the Jam Jar Jar symbol is really useful in the Jammin' Jars slot. This smiling colored jar is the Wild and has a bonus property of shifting left and right on the reels, looking for further winning combinations.
To set the game for the spin, you can see the Total Bet window located in the center, just below the 8×8 grid. By clicking or tapping on the up arrow symbol, a table of available sums that can be played for each spin is displayed. Smaller amounts are €0.20, €0.40, €0.60, and €1.00. Each of these amounts is replicated but with the decimal point moved to the right, once and twice. So on the next row we have amounts ending in €10.00 and in the third row amounts that are two digits and end in €100.00. We believe that this range of bets offers enough options so that every player can find a pleasant sum for their style of play and budget.

Similar Slot Machines to Jammin' Jars
Unfortunately, we cannot recommend other Jam-themed slot machines, as Jammin' Jars, the slot produced by Push Gaming, is probably one of a kind. Instead, what we can do is recommend Wild Frames, the traditional slot produced by Play N Go that allows you to win up to 7,000x!

message.content:
Jammin Jars
Push Gaming has released Jammin' Jars - a slot game with symbols that fall and collect on an eight-by-eight vertical and horizontal grid. In addition to the cascading symbols feature, the game offers the opportunity to win consecutively. There is a free spins bonus feature, and there are two in-game kickers, like the rainbow reels that occur randomly and the Jim Jar wilds that modify the grid in more than one way. Play for a chance to win €10,000 for the best payout on a 96.80% Return to Player rate.

Sweet graphics
The 64 squares on the grid are filled with various fruits and the goal of the game, and the most anticipated outcome at the same time, is to see any of these symbols form a cluster. But wait! Why is the Jammin' Jars slot called Jammin' Jars when all the symbols are fruits? Well, there is a jar symbol that defines the gameplay of the release. The Jam Jar Jar symbol is basically the Wild, which replaces any symbol, but also does a few circus tricks of its own. Since Jammin' Jars is a type of "falling reels" game, every winning combination causes the winning group to disappear and make way for a new set of symbols. In this case, the Jam Jar Jar symbol will make a random move on another vertical row after being part of a winning combination.
Is this the only feature of the game? Not even close. Although there is only one additional bonus, it is one that is as worthy as the entire game itself. This is the free spins bonus that is obtained thanks to the - you guessed it - smiling Jam Jars. Let's take a look at some additional details about the game, so that players can get to the part where they see some fruits explode and return potential winnings.

Features and symbols of the Jammin' Jars slot machine
Whenever the jar symbol appears, it will likely have a multiplier, ranging from 1x to 5x. This means that the base game winnings with the jar will be multiplied by the amount indicated on the jar. So landing three of the Jam Jar Jar symbols on the reels will trigger the Free Games Feature. The same bonus property of this symbol remains during free spins, with the addition of them remaining in position after a cascade or a winning combo.
Last but not least, the rainbow feature is randomly activated after a non-winning spin. The result of this bonus is a colossal symbol added to the reels that can interact with a large number of symbols.
The game's winning combination includes a large cluster on the grid, preferably one that covers 25 or more squares on the grid. If this ever happens, the lucky player will see fairly decent cash prizes. Let's say you're playing with a €1.00 bet per spin. In this case, the biggest win from a single spin, based on a base game winning symbol, will be €100.00 for a cluster of 25 strawberries or more, and a win of €40.00 for a cluster that includes between 20 and 24 symbols of this type.
Otherwise, the way to get wins is to have symbols on adjacent rows and reels. So even if five symbols appear, the prize will return the €1.00 bet. Anything more than 5 symbol clusters translates into a bigger payout. But this is where the Jam Jar Jar symbol is really useful in the Jammin' Jars slot. This smiling colored jar is the Wild and has a bonus property of shifting left and right on the reels, looking for further winning combinations.
To set the game for the spin, you can see the Total Bet window located in the center, just below the 8×8 grid. By clicking or tapping on the up arrow symbol, a table of available sums that can be played for each spin is displayed. Smaller amounts are €0.20, €0.40, €0.60, and €1.00. Each of these amounts is replicated but with the decimal point moved to the right, once and twice. So on the next row we have amounts ending in €10.00 and in the third row amounts that are two digits and end in €100.00. We believe that this range of bets offers enough options so that every player can find a pleasant sum for their style of play and budget.

Jammin' Jars is a slot game with symbols that fall and collect on an eight-by-eight vertical and horizontal grid. Besides the cascading symbols feature, the game offers the opportunity to win consecutively.

Gameplay

The game's winning combination includes a large cluster on the grid, preferably, one that covers 25 or more squares on the grid. Betting Range

Gameplay mechanics

Jammin' Jars is a slot game where symbols fall and collect on an 8x8 vertical and horizontal grid. Winning combinations cause the winning group to disappear, allowing new symbols to fall in place.

Symbols and grid design

The Jammin' Jars grid is filled with various fruit symbols with the goal of forming clusters. The game also features a Jam Jar Jar symbol, which acts as a wild and replaces any symbol with its own circus tricks.

Bonus features

The game offers a free spins bonus feature triggered by landing three Jam Jar Jar symbols on the reels. The feature retains the bonus property of the wilds, which remain in position after a cascade or winning combo. There is also a Rainbow feature that randomly activates after a non-winning spin, where a colossal symbol is added to the reels that can interact with many symbols on the grid.

Rainbow reels

The Rainbow feature randomly activates after a non-winning spin. It results in a colossal symbol added to the reels that can interact with many symbols on the grid.

Jim Jar wilds

The Jim Jar symbol is the wild, which replaces any symbol and has a bonus property of shifting left and right on the reels, looking for further winning combinations.

Graphics and design

Jammin' Jars features sweet graphics with 64 squares on the grid filled with various fruits. The animations are smooth and visually appealing, making for a pleasant gaming experience overall.

Winning combinations

The game's winning combinations are clusters formed by adjacent rows and reels. The biggest win from a single spin occurs when a cluster of 25 or more symbols occurs on the grid, with potential winnings of up to €10,000 with a 96.80% Return to Player rate. The Jam Jar Jar symbol, which has a multiplier ranging from 1x to 5x, also increases the chances of winning decent cash prizes.

Betting options

Review: Jammin Jars
Push Gaming has released Jammin' Jars - a slot game with symbols that fall and collect on an eight-by-eight vertical and horizontal grid. In addition to the cascading symbols feature, the game offers the opportunity to win consecutively. There is a free spins bonus feature, and there are two in-game kickers, like the rainbow reels that occur randomly and the Jim Jar wilds that modify the grid in more than one way. Play for a chance to win €10,000 for the best payout on a 96.80% Return to Player rate.

Sweet graphics
The 64 squares on the grid are filled with various fruits and the goal of the game, and the most anticipated outcome at the same time, is to see any of these symbols form a cluster. But wait! Why is the Jammin' Jars slot called Jammin' Jars when all the symbols are fruits? Well, there is a jar symbol that defines the gameplay of the release. The Jam Jar Jar symbol is basically the Wild, which replaces any symbol, but also does a few circus tricks of its own. Since Jammin' Jars is a type of "falling reels" game, every winning combination causes the winning group to disappear and make way for a new set of symbols. In this case, the Jam Jar Jar symbol will make a random move on another vertical row after being part of a winning combination.
Is this the only feature of the game? Not even close. Although there is only one additional bonus, it is one that is as worthy as the entire game itself. This is the free spins bonus that is obtained thanks to the - you guessed it - smiling Jam Jars. Let's take a look at some additional details about the game, so that players can get to the part where they see some fruits explode and return potential winnings.

Features and symbols of the Jammin' Jars slot machine
Whenever the jar symbol appears, it will likely have a multiplier, ranging from 1x to 5x. This means that the base game winnings with the jar will be multiplied by the amount indicated on the jar. So landing three of the Jam Jar Jar symbols on the reels will trigger the Free Games Feature. The same bonus property of this symbol remains during free spins, with the addition of them remaining in position after a cascade or a winning combo.
Last but not least, the rainbow feature is randomly activated after a non-winning spin. The result of this bonus is a colossal symbol added to the reels that can interact with a large number of symbols.
The game's winning combination includes a large cluster on the grid, preferably one that covers 25 or more squares on the grid. If this ever happens, the lucky player will see fairly decent cash prizes. Let's say you're playing with a €1.00 bet per spin. In this case, the biggest win from a single spin, based on a base game winning symbol, will be €100.00 for a cluster of 25 strawberries or more, and a win of €40.00 for a cluster that includes between 20 and 24 symbols of this type.
Otherwise, the way to get wins is to have symbols on adjacent rows and reels. So even if five symbols appear, the prize will return the €1.00 bet. Anything more than 5 symbol clusters translates into a bigger payout. But this is where the Jam Jar Jar symbol is really useful in the Jammin' Jars slot. This smiling colored jar is the Wild and has a bonus property of shifting left and right on the reels, looking for further winning combinations.
To set the game for the spin, you can see the Total Bet window located in the center, just below the 8×8 grid. By clicking or tapping on the up arrow symbol, a table of available sums that can be played for each spin is displayed. Smaller amounts are €0.20, €0.40, €0.60, and €1.00. Each of these amounts is replicated but with the decimal point moved to the right, once and twice. So on the next row we have amounts ending in €10.00 and in the third row amounts that are two digits and end in €100.00. We believe that this range of bets offers enough options so that every player can find a pleasant sum for their style of play and budget.

Similar Slot Machines to Jammin' Jars
Unfortunately, we cannot recommend other Jam-themed slot machines, as Jammin' Jars, the slot produced by Push Gaming, is probably one of a kind. Instead, what we can do is recommend Wild Frames, the traditional slot produced by Play N Go that allows you to win up to 7,000x!
